body: Hi Paul, You can't create multiple views at the same time unless you use multiple components (one for each vector) but there is a way to create named views for each vector. Check the attached file. All you need to do is to animate the slider. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/KhhA6XZToLqjNTzncJdygOFT-JlxoiC-az5UTu8sFxA55D2Bc*vS3xEMGIgkn-Qbx*xabDr8owMFdz51QtiJrUunljPlFWN9/addNamedViews.png)
